alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 10:44PM CDT until April 10 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Northwestern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Central Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1044 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Enid, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Waukomis, Garber, Billings, Breckenridge, Hunter, Fairmont, Vance Air Force Base and North Enid. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
